name: Carl
descriptions: Carl is a ghoul found dead, near Dunbar, in the Old Olney underground in 2277.

A member of the ghoul settlement program, Carl was responsible for settlement medication and well-being, as a new camp was established at, away from Underworld. Alas, all in the group succumed to deathclaws after the camp was established in Old Olney underground.
Carl appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Broken Steel.
